column4: I am having the same problem that sizzam is - even when I use Compiz
Guessing this is a common issue
also, my audigy2 doesnt seem to be working... alsa sees it and my onboard, but when I enable the audigy I get no sound... :|
then tell me the url of the paste
do you want your Audigy 2 ZS to be the default?
thanks a bunch I will try :)
yes I did, and it didn't work :)
amixer set 'Audigy Analog/Digital Output Jack' unmute
thanks! that worked. What exactly does that command? I tried switching the button in the alsa mixer before... I wonder why it works now :)
different codec revisions require different settings for that control element
